# [Story] ORB-051: Add TikTok integration

## Parent Epic

Parent: #518 (Platform Integration)

## Description

Implement full TikTok integration including OAuth authentication, video posting capabilities, analytics collection, and trend monitoring features.

## Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] TikTok OAuth 2.0 flow implemented with proper token refresh handling
- [ ] Video posting support with caption, hashtags, and sound selection
- [ ] Analytics collection including views, likes, shares, comments, and follower growth
- [ ] Trend monitoring dashboard showing relevant hashtags and sounds
- [ ] Rate limiting and API quota management implemented

## Technical Notes

- Use TikTok Marketing API for business accounts and Content Posting API for creator accounts
- Implement video format validation (MP4, max 60 seconds for standard, 3 minutes for extended)
- Store analytics in time-series format for trend analysis
